content.text:
# Draft:Barwar (Rajput clan)

----
Barwar is a Rajput clan of northern India  which is a branch of Trilokchand Bais The names of his two ancestors were Bariyar Singh and Chahu Singh. Both are sons of King Chatrasena and King Trilokchand Bais' 7 In the province of Unnao district's Daundiya Khera Those who came to Ayodhya from Unnao in the year 1585, had established the state on the boundary of 14 Kosh river.  The name of the Paridhi of 14 kos was named after Bariyar Singh. That is why Bariyar Singh is also called Barwar Singh. That is how the Barwar dynasty was established.
